body:
The imports in `spec.py` are getting to be pretty unwieldy.  This probably means the file needs to be broken up, but for now we can at least clean up the namespace.

- [x] Remove all of the `import from` style imports and replace them with `import` or `import as`
- [x] Remove a number names that were exported by `spack.spec` that weren't even in `spack.spec`
title: refactor: cleanup imports in spec.py
